reviews.tvSnippet: We bought a Grandstream handset from Axxess and it‚Äôs BEEN giving us problem for YEARS UPON YEARS. We tried to contact Ax...
reviews.text:
We bought a Grandstream handset from Axxess and it‚Äôs BEEN giving us problem for YEARS UPON YEARS. We tried to contact Axxcess to help us with this issue and the phone will receive phone calls for one day and the next day back to not working! It is affecting our business!! This is one of the emails I sent to them:

Good morning,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a SERIOUS ISSUE with your Grandstream handset that we should be using to receive phone calls but instead it does not ring and we only can make phone calls with it. I called your helpline 3 weeks back and spoke to numerous call centre agents and none of them managed to help. A specific agent I spoke to was a lady named Ntombi who managed to get the phone to ring for only one day then after that, it stopped working. I am not the only one from my company who has tried resolving this matter. It has been years upon years with us battling with this particular problem and Axxesss not hearing our demands for a service we pay every month for. We are losing valuable customers because of this and if this continues, we will have to cancel our service with Axxess and get better service and help elsewhere. On July the 11th at 3:31pm one of my co workers sent you the same query message that I am sending today and you did not respond to her email. I have called your helpline more than 15 times and I was put on hold for over 45 mins and they took down my number and said they will call me back but to this day, no one has called me yet. This problem has to be solved, enough is enough!

reviews.tvSnippet: I have been paying R499/R599 a month for speeds not exceeding 4MB/ps but the package I was on says 75MB/ps, LMAO. See at...
reviews.text: I have been paying R499/R599 a month for speeds not exceeding 4MB/ps but the package I was on says 75MB/ps, LMAO. See attached screenshots with MTN BUSINESS. I have now cancelled with Axxess. I logged numerous calls but to no avail, seems Axxess/MTN was throttling my speed without being close to the FUP.

reviews.tvSnippet: I had an amazing experience with Xhanti from the Axxess hosting department. His service was professional, quick, and ver...
reviews.text:
I had an amazing experience with Xhanti from the Axxess hosting department. His service was professional, quick, and very helpful. He took the time to understand my issue and made sure everything was resolved smoothly.

Thank you, Xhanti, for the great service.

reviews.tvSnippet: Spoke to a dude named Jared via the Axxess desktop app. Very efficient and quick response time. Didn't give me a run aro...
reviews.text: Spoke to a dude named Jared via the Axxess desktop app. Very efficient and quick response time. Didn't give me a run around or a hard time regarding cancellation (due to moving, not service related) and answered my host of questions in about 5 minutes. More businesses need this. Well done Axxess and thanks Jared

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess will lure you in with a promise that they do not believe in contracts and that your subscription with them is on ...
reviews.text:
Axxess will lure you in with a promise that they do not believe in contracts and that your subscription with them is on a month-to-month basis and that you can cancel at any time should you not be happy with their services.

They promise ultra fast internet speeds: "Say goodbye to buffering and slow speeds". However, I got EXTREMELY frustrated with VERY slow internet speeds. This was resolved within two days, and I decided to pay my monthly fee of R425-00. However, the next day I was back to "snail pace" internet speeds. After only a week with them, I decided to cancel my subscription.

I distinctly remembered reading the following on their website:
Their answer to the question "Do I need to sign up for a contract?" reads as follows: "No siree! At Axxess, we don't like contracts. All our services are month-to-month and can be easily cancelled if you change your mind."

BUT, when I tried to cancel my internet subscription with Axxess, I was informed I had to pay a cancellation fee of R499-00 should I decide to cancel within the first 6 months after joining them.

When I went back to their web site to read the small print, I saw the following sentence: "*Cancellation fees may apply if signing up on a Promotional offer." I did not sign up for a promotional offer, but STILL they charge a cancellation fee?!? SHARKS!!!

reviews.tvSnippet:
Excellent service which is what saves any situation.
I rely heavily on connectivity and our line speed had been bad for ...
reviews.text:
Excellent service which is what saves any situation.
I rely heavily on connectivity and our line speed had been bad for a while. We'd have the line reset, reboot the router, have good speeds and then it would drop shortly after.

On Friday morning I reported the issue via WhatsApp (very convenient!l). After attempting two line resets a ticket was logged at 12:00. At 12:15 I received a call from Marvel with the cause (hight traffic) and a solution (router upgrade). By 13:15 I collected my new router from Marvel at their offices.

Thanks for the continued support with your services.

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess provides reliable fibre services with excellent speed and uptime, and minimal interruptions. Their fibre packages...
reviews.text: Axxess provides reliable fibre services with excellent speed and uptime, and minimal interruptions. Their fibre packages are well-regarded for their consistent speeds and no downtime. I love that their pricing is competitive, and I can roll over my unused CallTime for up to three months. The setup process was simple, and their app works perfectly for managing calls. Overall, Axxess is a solid choice for home users and small businesses prioritizing affordability, flexibility, and seamless communication backed by reliable fibre connectivity.

reviews.tvSnippet: I used to think Axxess was one of the better ISP's out there and used to be happy with their service, but I have grown e...
reviews.text: I used to think Axxess was one of the better ISP's out there and used to be happy with their service, but I have grown extremely disappointed in their customer service. They have certainly gone backwards. I now have 2 unresolved tickets that no one even bothers to reply to even when I follow up. Not mentioning their chats where the agents simply drop you. This on top of me experiencing intermittent connectivity and logging faults and complaints. Going on for months now. The only thing keeping me from cancelling was a glimmer of faith in past performance but sadly all trust and confidence have now dissipated. They are officially worse than Telkom and I'll be switching to another ISP.

reviews.tvSnippet: A big thank you to Chrizell at Axxess. You guys have been wonderful, quick to respond, quick to resolve issues, and easy...
reviews.text:
A big thank you to Chrizell at Axxess. You guys have been wonderful, quick to respond, quick to resolve issues, and easy to get hold of.
Having dealt with other providers before, you guys have been a breath of fresh air. Keep up the good work.

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess has the best support people. I have been with them with various products for many many years and have been impres...
reviews.text: Axxess has the best support people. I have been with them with various products for many many years and have been impressed by the friendly efficient support I have received every single time I have contacted them.

reviews.tvSnippet: I've had a smooth surfing year with the service. Satisfied with my home LTE package, issues experienced where dealt with...
reviews.text: I've had a smooth surfing year with the service. Satisfied with my home LTE package, issues experienced where dealt with and resolved professionally. Thank you Axxess. Will upgrade to fiber when it's available in my area.

reviews.tvSnippet: I was very disappointed in the service I received. I think I would like to say to anyone wanting to use this provider, f...
reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the service I received. I think I would like to say to anyone wanting to use this provider, first make sure that they really cover your address. I have paid for my router after checking the address to make sure. Only a day after I received a message to say they dont service that specific place and there is no internet lines there. I immediately ask to stop the router delivery because I will obviously not be able  to use it. I asked to get the router refunded, because it wasnt due to my fault. Well I am still waiting for refund.

reviews.tvSnippet: Within a week and half after submitting my application my Fibre was installed yesterday and once the installation was co...
reviews.text:
Within a week and half after submitting my application my Fibre was installed yesterday and once the installation was completed, I contacted Axxess and within 10 minutes over the phone, everything was setup, active and live.
Consultants and installers are very friendly, professional and helpful.
Great service so far........

reviews.tvSnippet: As an avid gamer and someone who streams a lot, a stable connection with low latency is crucial. I joined Axxess in Augu...
reviews.text: As an avid gamer and someone who streams a lot, a stable connection with low latency is crucial. I joined Axxess in August 2023 and it's been a game-changer. The speeds are fantastic, the ping is consistently low, and I've had no issues with lag or buffering during peak hours. A top-tier service for anyone with heavy internet usage. It's just exactly on par with what I was looking for.

reviews.tvSnippet:
Terrible Terrible Terrible

They don't go an extra mile for their customers. I logged a fault on the 12th of September a...
reviews.text:
Terrible Terrible Terrible

They don't go an extra mile for their customers. I logged a fault on the 12th of September about slow to no connection. They resolved it 5 days later, citing a technical fault with vodacom. 4 days later, same problem again. To this day they haven't fixed it. I just asked for an update on their WhatsApp line, the agent tells me "there's no update at this stage" Like, are you kidding me??? Internet is not just for streaming but work and school purposes and they give me that?? Im so tired of them at this point. I paid R699 for services that aren't being rendered. Also, when you choose to leave, they charge R900.

reviews.tvSnippet: Super annoyed right now. Axxess service is non- existent. This is the second time this year I advised a customer to use ...
reviews.text: Super annoyed right now. Axxess service is non- existent. This is the second time this year I advised a customer to use Axxess for their new home fibre and after 2 weeks, they still aren‚Äôt able to connect even thought the fibre box is install and active, Axxess just sucks, you pay for services they can never get working because they‚Äôre lazy and plain useless. Opened multiple support tickets and call multiple times a day and all they say is ‚Äúwait till tomorrow‚Äù - wth Axxess‚Ä¶ wthhh! Will be cancelling and going to Vodacom 5G- don‚Äôt waste your time, I should have done this 2 weeks ago, it‚Äôs my new go to for my clients, faster than Axxess in both speed and delivery

reviews.tvSnippet: I have been with Axxess for close to five years now. My uptime is steady and speeds are okay. I've never reached promise...
reviews.text:
I have been with Axxess for close to five years now. My uptime is steady and speeds are okay. I've never reached promised speeds, but the ones I get are sufficient.

The missing one star is for the live chat when requiring assistance. It is slow. On a chat I waited 4 minutes after type just to get a response that says "one moment". Meaning I was going to wait longer.

reviews.tvSnippet:
After 3 months on using Axxess as my fibre service provider, I have had no issues at all with their services.
Support is...
reviews.text:
After 3 months on using Axxess as my fibre service provider, I have had no issues at all with their services.
Support is great and always available.
Highly recommendable.

reviews.tvSnippet: i personally dont have you as an ISP but i have clients that i have put your services into and i love your service, each...
reviews.text: i personally dont have you as an ISP but i have clients that i have put your services into and i love your service, each of my clients feel great as they feel they get almost personal attention. keep up the great work and team work

reviews.tvSnippet: Axxess is sometimes great and sometimes thats why i left a 3 star rating if they. Could go an extra mile for their custo...
reviews.text: Axxess is sometimes great and sometimes thats why i left a 3 star rating if they. Could go an extra mile for their customers they would be the best in SA .. their Live agents are slow but they tend to get the job Done  overall they aren't a Bad Company i prefer them over any company to provide services to you

reviews.tvSnippet: I have been using Axxess for a while now. The fibre internet is great and pricing is reasonable. I first used them when ...
reviews.text: I have been using Axxess for a while now. The fibre internet is great and pricing is reasonable. I first used them when I had a MTN Fixed LTE years back and the service was great.

reviews.tvSnippet:
The worst ISP experience I've had in a very long time.
For just over a year I have had countless issues with either inte...
reviews.text:
The worst ISP experience I've had in a very long time.
For just over a year I have had countless issues with either intermittent access or days on end without any access at all (strangely each time over a weekend or public holiday (or both).
I gave notice for end October and didn't have access to my WiFi network from  the 29th.  I then discovered that they had CHANGED my WiFi password without my consent or knowledge.  I cannot help but wonder how many times they had done that over the past months, leaving me without access to a network that I had paid for!!
Steer very far away from this company!

reviews.tvSnippet: Got MTN 5G in April 2025 worked well until August 2025. DL speeds were always above 200 Mbps and only dropped below that...
reviews.text: Got MTN 5G in April 2025 worked well until August 2025. DL speeds were always above 200 Mbps and only dropped below that during some peak hours 18:00 to 21:00. UL speeds were never very good and ranged between 2Mbps and 8Mbps. Since August 2025 the DL speed was throttled to 60 Mbps. I logged a service ticket and it was back to normal for less than a week and the process repeated for about 3 weeks after which my tickets were ignored and the responses changed to the service is not throttled while it is and speed test proof was supplied.

reviews.tvSnippet:
They have low speeds and unfair FUP (Fair Usage Policy).

I decided to cancel and they offered their useless 3 months re...
reviews.text:
They have low speeds and unfair FUP (Fair Usage Policy).

I decided to cancel and they offered their useless 3 months retention deal. Half off! Of course I took it and now they won't cancel after the 3 months passes and want to keep me for an additional 2 months.

I struggle with their connection all the time and I thought during this retention period, they would do anything to try and retain me as a customer but nothing has changed thus my request to leave them!

They are liars, they have impossible standards with a weak internet connection and have rigid rules.

Stay away from Axxess at all cost.

reviews.tvSnippet: I waited in the support queue for over 2 hours and 15 minutes, hoping to resolve a simple issue. Unfortunately, not a si...
reviews.text: I waited in the support queue for over 2 hours and 15 minutes, hoping to resolve a simple issue. Unfortunately, not a single problem was addressed and I didn‚Äôt receive any help at all. The long wait felt pointless, and no staff member reached out to assist me or provide updates. Two hours for basic support is unacceptable‚ÄîI wouldn‚Äôt recommend Axxess to anyone based on this experience.

I ...
reviews.text:

I appreciate the professionalism and prompt response.
